summary: Director Nathaniel Kahn searches to understand his father, noted architect Louis Kahn, who died bankrupt and alone in 1974.
cast: Edmund Bacon|Edwina Pattison Daniels|Balkrishna Doshi|Frank Gehry|Philip Johnson|Louis Kahn|Nathaniel Kahn|Sue Ann Kahn|Haym Richard Katz|Teddy Kollek|Harriet Pattison|Priscilla Pattison|I.M. Pei|Moshe Safdie|Robert A.M. Stern|Alexandra Tyng|Anne Tyng|Shamsul Wares
title: My Architect
